data.title: Packaging and Labeling for Clinical and Commercial
data.meta_description: CMIC Group's packaging and labeling team support clinical trials with double-blind investigational products and commercial products labeling.
data.meta_site_name: CMIC | Pharmaceutical Development Services (CRO, CDMO, CSO, Healthcare, Japan Entry)
data.text:
Our packaging and labeling team support randomized trials with double-blind investigational products. From building a blinding procedure checklist against the study protocol, ensuring study drugs have matching physical attributes, design label text has same color and print style, and carton assembly and tamper seals are identical, we ensure Sponsorsâ€™ study guidelines are met. Our packaging and labeling team also support your commercial products with efficient labeling once they have been approved. With every step of the labeling and packaging process, we ensure that clinical supply and commercial supply needs are met.

Our Edge in Packaging and Labeling

Specialty packaging options for a wide range of products
